item.title: IntermediatePython
item.author: Createitv
item.description: IntermediatePython *args和**kwargs 并不是必须写成*args 和**kwargs。 只有变量前面的 *(星号)才是必须的. 你也可以写成*var 和**va

item.author: Createitv
item.description: Lecture 0 Introduction Web Programming HTML (Hypertext Markup Language) Document Object Model (DOM) More HTML Elements Forms CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) Responsive Design Bootstrap Sass (Syntactically Awesome Style Sheets) Introduction In this course, we’re picking up where CS50 left off and diving into the design and creation of web applications.
